ygData.subject: Re: Thanks for all the great feedback
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks John(tm) :)  I am sure there are lots of small errors here and there, like stating the Pslam of Mystic shieldings formula for MR is lvl+190, lol. I go
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks John(tm) :) I am sure there are lots of small errors here and there,
like stating the Pslam of Mystic shieldings formula for MR is lvl+190, lol.
I go through and re-read each page when I make a change to try and catch
these.

I planned on moving the instrument information to the Quantified section as
I got in solid data point information to reverse enginneer the song formulas
with.

Rokenn


>From: <kim@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Thanks for all the great feedback
>Date: Tue, 16 Nov 1999 12:46:24 -0500 (EST)
>
>I took a quick glance through the site. Very nice job, very
>close to what I originally had in mind for when I HTMLized
>it. There are a couple mistakes here and there, I will send
>you a list later (maybe tonight) when I've had a chance to
>read everything. The most obvious one is that the slowdown
>for Chain/Binding is -30%, not -20%.
>
>I'm curious why you removed the instrument effect notes. I
>put that there to make it easier for people to decide whether
>to use weapons or switch to instruments.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
>with the subject submissions.
><< text3.html >>
